channel.title: [tut] Stopping NPCs from crashing the server after dying
channel.description: Simply Open your npc.cfg file press Ctrl + F and type the npc name then change the hp on the npc.... save and recompile... very simple tutorial lol

item.title: [tut] Stopping NPCs from crashing the server after dying
item.dc:creator: @motherload11 motherload11
item.description:
@motherload11 wrote:

maybe your making npcs health way to high and needs to calculate the combat when you already set its combat! I use it like this: I make hp either 2 levels below the combat or 15 levels higher then the combat lol

Read full topic

item.title: [tut] Stopping NPCs from crashing the server after dying
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

yes but it is true that some of the npcs in whitescape npc config dont have the hp so when you fight them the game crashes i simple put 2 hp for everything that didnt have it and it helped the big server rashes but not the logouts

Read full topic
